ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ بَشَّرْنَٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْقَٰنِطِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'We bring you good news of the truth, so do not be among those who despair.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have given you the happy tidings of a truth," they replied. "So do not be one of those who despair."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They said: "The good tiding we give you is of truth. Do not, therefore, be of those who despair."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They said, "We have given you the glad news for a true reason so do not despair".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “We have given you true tidings, therefore do not lose hope.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "We give you good news in truth. So do not be of those who despair."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: We give you good news with truth, therefore be not of the despairing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: give me good tidings?' They said, 'We give thee good tidings of truth. Be not of those that despair.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: We bring thee good tidings in truth. So be not thou of the despairing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "We have, indeed, given you glad tidings in truth; do not therefore despair."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: we bear tidings of a truth; be then thou not of the desponding.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘We bring you good news in truth; so do not be despondent.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "We give thee glad tidings in truth: be not then in despair!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They (the angels) said: "We give you glad tidings in truth. So be not of the despairing ones."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They replied: 'In truth we have given you glad tidings, do not be one of those who despair'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “We bring you good news in truth, so do not despair.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "We have given you good tidings in truth, so do not be of the despairing."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:55] They said, ‘We give you good tidings in truth, sincerely; so do not be of the despairing’, the despondent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: We bring thee good tidings in truth) that you will have a son. (So be not thou of the despairing) in relation to having a son.
